forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 68F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.
